tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: * ***** ***** *** ****** *** ****** ********************* ** ********** *** ********* ****** ** *** **** ********** ** **** *** *** ****** **** *** ********* ******* *** **** ** ****** ** *** **** ******** ******** He made a detailed list which shows I need to pay him 3400 rs in total. 400 extra on that day and 3000 in my next visit for the extraction. He wrote over the counter painkiller and didn't do the procedure on that day. He told me to bring 3000 rs and then he will operate. He did some xray for which he asked me money though he wouldn't be providing any hard copy. He has behaved very rudely pointing his finger and he even shouted towards us. He said multiple times that I have booked the appointment free of cost, I felt insulted by that. Just to reach his place cost me almost 500 in cab. ** **** ****** ** ** ***** **** *** **** **** * ****** ******* ** *********. It was a horrible experience for me and my father.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I find the doctor very good in his profession and very friendly too. I would be in a better position to comment more once my treatment is done on 11 th May.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Inside my lower jaw, a tooth was extracted by a dentist. As a result, there was a void which made eating and munching difficult. I wanted an implant but the dentist said it wasn't possible due to some issues with bone density. I then changed my dentist and met Dr. Kundu. He approached the problem from a different perspective and finally he did the implant successfully. I'm extremely happy. Moreover, Dr. Kundu sees patients by appointment. So, one need not wait for long. Finally, his clinic is very clean and the assistants are friendly and helpful.

review:
Dr. Kundu is not only very friendly to his patient but also very sympathetic to my 90 years old father suffering from dimentia.
I called  him up several times after the dental procedure of my father for his health issues . Each time he responded promptly and guided us in a very decent manner.
We are thankful to him
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I did not feel that I had a surgery done. It was a one and a half hour to two hour surgery. The clinic is very clean and doctors and staff ensure patients safety and well-being. All equipment’s at the clinic are clean. The Doctor explained the issue in details for a simple person to understand, they were very kind and empathetic. They value time, I have been there 3 times so far and never had to wait.

review: Doctor's patience against patient's nagging questions, but ultimately satisfying patient's queries, and also his non-ignoring previous doctor's prescription produced by this patient, which was studied by him, before his own prescribing, thereby advocating old adage - "Heart is more important than brain" (as mythologically answered by Yudhishthira to the one of two questions of Dharma, who was in disguise of a python snake, while in last journey).
